Description:
Detects when sign-ins increased by 10% or greater.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', MikeDuddington, '@dudders1'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Increased Failed Authentications Of Any Type
Query: sourcetype='azure-signinlogs' eql select * from _source_ where status = 'failure' and count = '<10%'
